name: Microsoft Help Index File
summary: Learn about .MSHI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: MSHI files are used for indexing the content in .MSHC help container files. When an MSHI file exists, it is deployed with the corresponding MSHC file within a signed .CAB archive.
NOTE: MS Help Viewer 1.x replaces the MS Help 2.x (.HXS) and MS Help 1.x (.CHM) formats.

description: Help documentation file created in the MS Help Viewer 1.x index format; saves a topical index that is used for browsing and searching the help documentation; used by software developers when authoring the help topics for their software titles.
